verses.text: If \w it|strong="H5375"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* not \w been|strong="H5375"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w was|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, let \w Israel|strong="H8064"\w* now say:

\w If|strong="H2009"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* not \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w When|strong="H5704"\w* \w men|strong="H5650"\w* rose \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w Perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* swallowed \w us|strong="H3588"\w* up alive. \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fury \w was|strong="H3068"\w* enkindled against \w us|strong="H3588"\w*,
Perhaps \w the|strong="H7646"\w* waters \w had|strong="H7646"\w* swallowed \w us|strong="H5315"\w* up.
Our soul hath passed through a torrent: perhaps our soul had passed through a water insupportable.
Blessed be the Lord, who hath not given us to be a prey to their teeth.
Our soul hath been delivered as a sparrow out of the snare of the followers. The snare is broken, and we are delivered.
Our help is in the name of the Lord, who made heaven and earth.
